channel.title: "purewowscape" SERVER IDEA! (NEED HELP)
channel.description:
Ok, here is the deal i was thinking about creating my own server i've hosted my own before but i was thinking of creative ideas for a new server. I was thinking about a server based on, "pures." It will kind of almost be like a world of warcraft-style runescape, (sounds fun right?) The only thing is i suck at coding, i mean i've hosted my own server before i have a basic understanding of java, but not NEARLY enough to code my complete own server. I need some one that is pretty advanced at coding and has lots of patients. --------------------------PM ME IF YOU ARE UP FOR THE JOB---------------------------------
[center] [u]The server[/u][/center] [center]What i want for the server are the following things.[/center] -[i]SILAB COMPATIBALE PLEASE[/i] -[i]In the starting area you will pick what, "path," you will choose, and then you will type ::(type of pure) and then once you type that you will be teleported to a different spot and there will be a mage-liek starting area, etc.[/i] -[i]Custom starting area (of course)[/i] -[i]three differnt kinds of, "pures,"[/i] -[i]Mage pure[/i] -[i]Range Pure[/i] -[i]warrior pure[/i] [u]the following, "pures," will use only magic range or combat -the mage pure can only use magic and defence and hit points. (and the secondary skills) -the range pure can only use range and defence and hit points. (and the secondary skills) -the strength pure can only use strength, attack, defence, & HP. (and secondary skills) [/u]
[u]You will have to be able to tweak with item bonuses and item restrictions for the pures. you will have to make sure the each pure can only use certian items. EX: the mage pure can only use mage items. [/u]
[u]If you are interested and want more details then PLEASE Pm me! I really think this server will work if i get enough pple to apply for jobs.[/u]
[center][b]Jobs![/b][/center]
[center][b]Coders[/b][/center] [center][i] Coder (open) [/i][/center]
[center][b]Hosters[/b][/center] [center][i] Hoster (open) [/i][/center]
[center][b]Admins/staff[/b][/center] [center][i] Co-Owner (open) Admin (open) Mod (open) [/i][/center]
[center][b]testers[/b][/center] [center][i] Tester (open) Tester (open) [/i][/center] [center][b]NOTE:[i]tester spots wont be open untill i get a coder[/i][/b][/center]
Please Please PLEASE! PM and leave comments about it!

item.dc:creator: @emocabbage emocabbage
item.description:
@emocabbage wrote:

does anyone actually wanna help cuz i think this is a cool idea anyone else agree? cuz if not ill just drop i tryed the best i could to not get flamed, but you know mopar forum always someone has to put someone down. Now there is liek 4 pple arguing on my thread PLEASE i’m wondering if anyone wants to help not bitch about a devolpment team. This is the server development and help section is it not?

Read full topic

item.title: "purewowscape" SERVER IDEA! (NEED HELP)
item.dc:creator: @emocabbage emocabbage
item.description:
@emocabbage wrote:

Ok, here is the deal i was thinking about creating my own server i’ve hosted my own before but i was thinking of creative ideas for a new server. I was thinking about a server based on, “pures.” It will kind of almost be like a world of warcraft-style runescape, (sounds fun right?) The only thing is i suck at coding, i mean i’ve hosted my own server before i have a basic understanding of java, but not NEARLY enough to code my complete own server. I need some one that is pretty advanced at coding and has lots of patients.
--------------------------PM ME IF YOU ARE UP FOR THE JOB---------------------------------

                               [center] [u]The server[/u][/center]

[center]What i want for the server are the following things.[/center]
-SILAB COMPATIBALE PLEASE
-In the starting area you will pick what, “path,” you will choose, and then you will type ::(type of pure) and then once you type that you will be teleported to a different spot and there will be a mage-liek starting area, etc.
-Custom starting area (of course)
-three differnt kinds of, “pures,”
-Mage pure
-Range Pure
-warrior pure
the following, “pures,” will use only magic range or combat
-the mage pure can only use magic and defence and hit points. (and the secondary skills)
-the range pure can only use range and defence and hit points. (and the secondary skills)
-the strength pure can only use strength, attack, defence, & HP. (and secondary skills)

You will have to be able to tweak with item bonuses and item restrictions for the pures.
you will have to make sure the each pure can only use certian items. EX: the mage pure can only use mage items.

If you are interested and want more details then PLEASE Pm me!
I really think this server will work if i get enough pple to apply for jobs.

[center]Jobs![/center]

[center]Coders[/center]
[center]
Coder (open)
[/center]

[center]Hosters[/center]
[center]
Hoster (open)
[/center]

[center]Admins/staff[/center]
[center]
Co-Owner (open)
Admin (open)
Mod (open)
[/center]

[center]testers[/center]
[center]
Tester (open)
Tester (open)
[/center]
[center]NOTE:tester spots wont be open untill i get a coder[/center]

Please Please PLEASE! PM and leave comments about it!
